definition: surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
to search (a place)/to search (a database etc)
to ask for compensation/to claim damages/claim for damages
to feel about/to grope about/to fumble/to do things slowly
variant of 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3]/Somalia
